name: PassTheGameJam Vol. 1: Dirty Feet
description:
All the games were made in about 3 hours in PassTheGameJam fashion: everyone makes a small part of a game which is then passed on to the others who will also add a part, resulting in a complete game. Next to that, they can't tell each other what they want the game to be.

Included in the bundle:

  • Smelly Legs Factory
  • Vieze Voeten Conquest
  • Vieze Voeten AssasinKiller
